comments.comment:
What this Catholic Ranjan Ramanayake doing is part of Ranil's agenda to discredit the Buddhist Establishment.¬†

These same accusations are there for the Catholic Church which Ranjan is not highlighting. He is only mentioning the Catholic Church which is highly structured and organized establishment much more than the Buddhist Establishment in Sri Lanka as well the richest single such establishment in the world. Catholic Church is complicit in child molestation throughout the world and the Vatican is complicit in giving safe haven to child molester priests. Pope and his management at the Vatican have been found to have transferred accused priests from one location to another to hide them and they have gone to re-offend. 

Recently Cardinal Pell of Australia was condemned to years in prison for his part in abusing children. To show a balance Ranjan should equally investigate the Sri Lankan Catholic Establishment for child abuse. What happens to Altar Boys, those in seminaries and other Christian / Catholic Boarding Schools is not different from the accusations he is making against Buddhist Priests.¬†

Catholic Ranjan is trying is to bring a rift between the Christians / Catholics against Buddhist. This is an operation sanctioned by Ranil to destabilize the rapprochement that is taking place between Buddhists and Christians after the Easter Sunday attacks.
comments.author: Sarath Bulathsinghala

comments.comment:
Oba saama de ganama investigate karala saama jaraa vada karana minisun gana hoyaaganna daksha amathi kenek vunath Rishard Badurdeenge ratata saha mahajanayaata karapu saha danatath karagena yana hora vada ( SATHOSA  saha Vilpattu) duushana, mankolla, vanchaa vada, abuse of power, kisima deyak gana hoya danduvam laba dena vada pilivelak yodanna  sakthiyak nathi, baya gulu ,pitakondak nathi boru sobana kaarayek vashayen thamai mama obava dakinne. Banku horu tikath eliye, Lankavata harak saha haal gennapu ekath joliye innava, Soukia Amathiya gahana gahili, lankaavata kunu (UK hospital waste) genaapu eka, oba novei evaa gana investigate karanne, mulu ratema beheth kal panapu badu  hospital valata denne, Chalenge ekak ganna oba kava daavath ovun gana soyanna yanne naha, hethuva  haamduruvon vage kata vahagena ovun inne naha, obata panna panna gahanne egollanta viruddava eka deyak gana hari oba karanna giyoth, ara adikaranayata kata gahanna gihilla puka bima anunatath vada antha venava. 



¬†Anith eka thamai oba oya podi evunge kunu avussala me satha deke maadia tika allagena loku vada kaaraya vage lakunu daaganna karana kriyaavak pamanai, varadi karapu ekekutavath danduvamak labaadena vada satahanak karagnna therenne naha, dan parlimenthuve ranga paanava hondama naluvaa vashayen.... habai ara sangayaa vahanselaata viruddava kathaa karpu eken dan nam 'Oskar' eka ganna barivena vidiyatai penenne, evitharak nove mulu UNP ekatama lakunu kapila boudda chanda salli valata gannath bari venava. 

Mama obata garu karanava oba me varadi karuvanva neethiya idiriyata genagos kohoma hari ovun varadi karuvan kerovvoth. Ara podi eka Iraj obage kanen ringuva hati dakkama video ekai, eeta pasu phone conversation ekai obage standard eka hondatama bimata vatuna. Atta pamanak kata karaata vadak naha mahajanayata saha ratata eken avesaana prathi palayak nathinam, etakota venne kelam karuvek vena eka vitari. Obage shramaya vatina vidiyata paavichchi karanna min pasu professional kenek vaage.
comments.author: Raj Warnakulasuriya

Dushitha hamuduruwo hire demme me aanduwa kalemai namuth upasaka ammala samanera wahansela dushanaya karapu hamuduruwanta eapa dunneth me aanduwa kalemai eda yapane Divya wenuwen handa nagapu Seya duwa wenuwen handa nagapu Ranjan me hamuduruwanta eapa deddi nihadai eya danne ne. 
Namuth ada me weddi rate prashna walata medihath wela kaha cheeware eliyata behela me katta kairatika deshapaluwo karana winasheta erehi weddida meyata me hamuduruwange dushana chodana gena katha karanna hithune?
  Meka thamai lankawe kujitha sakkili deshapalane.  Den me hamuduruwo jeewithaaanthaya dakwama hire yaida?
Ethakota me millejjayan 4-5 denek karapu weradi nisa ape budu sasunata samanera swaminwahansela awashya nedda?
Den me prashne nisa budu dahama me raten thuran karanna oneda?
 Rajapakshalage hema rahasakma prvt cid daala hoya gaththa methumata a dawalwala oya pansalwala wechcha dewal nithiya idirita awith thiyeddith ai hoya beluwe neththe?
   Mage puthath man mahana karanna inne eya kemathie mahana wenna. Namuth man eya langa nethi nisa a de parakku karala thiyenawa. 
Ethakota mage daruwage a pinata me prashna nisa man baadawak wenna oneda?
   Weredda dakinna ona welawe nodekka weradi rate  me  thiranathmaka mohothaka dekima genai man katha kale. 
Oya patalawa ganna epa. 
 Rata watema muslim minissunge nithiyata kaathi usavi 66 k hadana kan unge salli kuttiyata yatawela hitapu unui inna unui niwata wela balan hitiya namuth me wenakan me rate sanga adikaranak pihitawa ganna puluwan  unada awasara dunnada?
Ewata kisima ekek katha karanne ne.
Obathumiya mawa waradawa wataha ganna epa.

@Nirmala Pushpakumari OYA VEDANAVEN KATHA KARANA BAVA THERENAVA. OYA ARA PODI HAMUDURUVO ANDA ANDA KIYAPU KATHAVA AHUVADA EKA  AHANAKOTA MATATH ANDUNA. MATA THIYENNE DUBALAYA KEREHI UNUVANA HADAVATHAK

@renuka damayanthi 
Oyage aagama kumak unath mata adala ne. Ranjan kiyanne aththa kiyala mama hondata dannawa. Namuth man kiwene a kathawa weradie kiyala .
 Dan awrudu gaanak me uthum  budda cheewareta muwa wela lama apachara wagema upasak ammala dushanaya karala chodana labapu hamuduruwo hitiya innawa. Naduth  thiyenawa samaharu thama hireth innawa.
 Oya deshapalana hingannanta kade giyata man ehema ne. Wereddak  kawru kalath weradi wenna ona.
 Ada me udu thiringe natan Ranjan amathithuma giya awruddeth me awruddeth oya wage hamuduruwo dushan chodanawalata me aanduwenma hire daala dawas 14n, maasa 3n maasa 6 n eapa deela eliyata demma. (  Passku praharayata kalin)
  Ethakota den me hamuduruwo allagena Ranilage carrom bord eke inna thawath eka iththek unu meyata denda mathak une owa gena katha karanna?
 Meka thamai me rate deshapalana wiyuhaye heluwa sahodari. 
Eda Anagarika Darmapalathumata Ananda m3 himiyantath UNP eken gehuwwe ohoma thamai.
Awasaneta buddagayawai lak deranai sinhala urumai wenuwen satan karapu Anagarika Darmapalathuma indiyawe niwasa adassiyata path karanakan unp eke un kumanthrana karala gehuwwa .
 Adath a demai wenne. Paasku praharayen passe budda puthrayan wahansela rata jathiya aagama wenuwen paarata behela mandabuddika  minissunge manasa  hadanna ganna weyamata kelinna patan gaththa .
 Oluwak thiyenawanam poddak athithei warthamanayai sasadala balanna.
 Me ratata wina keruwe kawada kiyala. Eda maha eun kala kallathoni sakkili weda ada ungen ithuru wela inna eka karanawa wenas wenas wes muhunu daagen.
 Katha karanna ona welawata katha nokrana un den puduma jathika aalayak issarahata dagena famas wenne. ü§£ü§£ü§£

@E. Cinema gon ayye. Thoge lokka gena kiyanakota Mala paninawada. Thoge wesa balla podi lamayek wa kasada bendala full aathal gatha. Eeth lamayek hadaganna beriwuna neda. Berima thena neda kelewata gihilla podi kollo gahanna Patan gathe. Passe samahara genuth ekathuwune okata. Awurudu 2500 udadi ganna ona aathal okkoma aragena full choon eke indala thiyanne. Nikan boruwata pake aagamaklu. Darshanayak lu. Oya gal yugaye agama darshana me satha warshayata hariynnehe. Hamuduruwanta kasadayak bendala lamai hadaganna Ida deepalla. Netham umbage lamai pansal giyath dooshanata lakwei

Eeta passe neda podi kollo gahanna Patan gathe. Eeka neda umbalage lokko follow karanne. Siwura dagena pansalata ena podi kollo kellanwa dooshana karanawa. Umba pathara balannedda.
